thread.title: Snow totals for DC, Dulles, and BWI: 1st inch of DC snow in 728 days
thread.title_full: Snow totals for DC, Dulles, and BWI: 1st inch of DC snow in 728 days

author: Tucker Barnes
title: Snow totals for DC, Dulles, and BWI: 1st inch of DC snow in 728 days
text: WASHINGTON - It's official! For the first time in nearly two years, over an inch of snow was recorded in Washington D.C.! FOX 5â€™s Tucker Barnes says Washington, D.C. recorded 3.6 inches, Dulles International saw 4.1 inches, and Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport also saw 4.1 inches. Snow totals for Washington DC, Maryland, and Virginia: 1st inch of DC snow in 728 days Here are totals from elsewhere in the region from the National Weather Service: TOTAL SNOWFALL AMOUNTS SNOW TOTALS DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA ...District of Columbia...
